name: tuberous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having, looking like, or relating to a tuber (= the swollen underground stem or root of a plant such as a potato): Separate the tuberous roots carefully and replant the youngest pieces. Red potatoes are spherical, medium-sized, tuberous vegetables with thin red skins. See
tuber
More examplesFewer examplesThe petals of the tuberous begonias are edible. The roots are tuberous and can be divided.The plant produces starchy, tuberous, root vegetables used in many regional cuisines.
